reasoning: The plan is structured to first identify the core components and steps required to achieve the high-level goal 'Dimas Realm'. This involves breaking down the goal into 'Task Agnostic Steps' (TAS) by the TAS extractors. Subsequently, Lyra will refine these steps into actionable prompts for the design and development roles. Aurora will then design the elements, Kodax and Qwen3-WebDev will implement them, and finally, the Deliverable Integrator will bring everything together. This iterative approach ensures that each stage builds upon the previous one, fostering collaboration and alignment towards the ultimate goal.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor
roles.description: Identify and extract each 'Task Agnostic Step' (TAS) towards the high-level goal.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structure workflows and ensure clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generate aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implement designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Generate web development code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) based on user requests, ensuring modern design principles, responsiveness, and functionality.

tasks.task: Identify and extract Task Agnostic Steps (TAS) for 'Dimas Realm'.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Identify and extract Task Agnostic Steps (TAS) for 'Dimas Realm'.
tasks.name: TASe

tasks.task: Identify and extract Task Agnostic Steps (TAS) for 'Dimas Realm'.
tasks.name: uTASe

tasks.task: Consolidate TAS from GPTASe, TASe, and uTASe. Structure these into a coherent workflow and generate system prompts for the Designer (Aurora).
tasks.name: Lyra

tasks.task: Based on the prompts from Lyra, generate aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows for 'Dimas Realm', ensuring accessibility and visual balance.
tasks.name: Aurora

tasks.task: Implement the designs provided by Aurora into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.
tasks.name: Kodax

tasks.task: Generate web development code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) based on the designs from Aurora and the code structure from Kodax, ensuring modern design principles, responsiveness, and functionality.
tasks.name: Qwen3-WebDev

tasks.task: Integrate the code deliverables from Kodax and Qwen3-WebDev into a cohesive 'Dimas Realm'. Perform quality checks and validation.
tasks.name: Fizz La Metta
